POLITICAL WOMAN MAGAZINE
LETTERS FROM NICARAGL
FACE OFE D H ma
PHOTOGRAPHY ARTS A PEHB MK BaO UJa n Ie L NS Pyb EYa FEe d G R Fsa R A A AE CkB N AC Ga ShK Yn MNaa A y. :n A a tO a NUeH,R l S I R A SP KUS.L O E VNSIAY
POLITICAL WOMAN is a literary publication that discusses current topics of critical
interest to the woman intellect, voter and/or current event follower.
POLITICAL WOMAN, already popular with libraries and universities has gained
widespread popularity in the past year, because of its regularly featured columns:
government/politics, business/finance, health/science/environment, culture/books/theatre.
Each issue also has humor, insider stories, international newsbriefs, and special exclusive
features.
In recent issues, contributors such as Sarah Brady, Congressman Bob Dornan, ACLU,
Planned Parenthood, and more have "faced off" on —abortion, apartheid, contra aid,
euthanasia, aids, pornography, gun control.
POLITICAL WOMAN attracts high income readers that appreciate a more literary style of
journalism.
Each 8 1/2 x 11 journal has a high quality, four-color, perfect bound cover.
ISSN 0896-7202
Ordering information—50% off retail. (Cover price $2.50). Minimum order ten
magazines. (Minimum payment $16.50—$12.50 plus $4.00 shipping—regardless of
quantity. All orders sent C.O.D. unless pre-paid.
Undamaged returns may be credited towards future purchases.
Distributed by United Resource Books, which also distributes a full-line of "how to" art
books and CLEARING YOUR CREDIT.
Send order and check to United Resource Books, 629 Terminal Way, Unit 10, Costa
Mesa, California, 92627. Phone orders (714) 631-8339, Fax (714) 642-0165.
